name: context7-cursor-integration
description: Context7 integration for Cursor to fetch relevant documentation based on user queries

scripts.health-check: node -e "const CursorHandler = require('./cursor-handler'); const handler = new CursorHandler(); handler.healthCheck().then(console.log);"
scripts.clear-cache: node -e "const CursorHandler = require('./cursor-handler'); const handler = new CursorHandler(); handler.clearCache().then(console.log);"
scripts.stats: node -e "const CursorHandler = require('./cursor-handler'); const handler = new CursorHandler(); console.log(JSON.stringify(handler.getStats(), null, 2));"
